rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan space combining an entrance hall, living room and dining area. Features a large window for natural light, with eco-friendly materials.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen and Dining Area Extension
rooms.description: Continuation of the living area, integrating kitchen functionalities with dining space. Equipped with energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed for maximum comfort, featuring south-facing windows to ensure natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed guest bedroom with a private balcony and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Guest)
rooms.description: A compact bathroom designed with sustainable fixtures.

rooms.name: Storage / Utility Room
rooms.description: A dedicated space for storage and housekeeping utilities.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large wooden door with energy-efficient glass panels.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light. Made from eco-friendly materials.

openings.name: Balcony Access for Guest Bedroom
openings.description: A sliding door that opens to a small balcony with greenery to ensure fresh air and Vastu balance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper Level)
rooms.description: A larger master bedroom with a private balcony, ensuring privacy and tranquility. South facing for natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (Upper Level)
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom for extended family with natural ventilation and adequate light.

rooms.name: Study or Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office/study area to support work-from-home requirements.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Master)
rooms.description: A spacious bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: A centrally located staircase connecting the ground and first floor, designed with safety and energy efficiency in mind.

openings.name: Balcony Door for Master Bedroom
openings.description: A sliding door leading to a private balcony ensuring natural light and ventilation.
